TH02.title: Why am I treated so bad?
content: Sometimes it all just feels unfair.
What are we working towards? Cowards, all of them.

TH03.title: #TBT
content: The night errands braintrust building with former Secretary of State Madeline Albright

TH04.title: It's Live
content: Follow up pon di 'gram... HOTSTEPPERS ONLY

TH05.title: Tablet I
content: Welcome to the world. <s>dont worry</s> We can't wait for you to grow, evolve, take, give. <s>dont change</s> You'll see new things, meet new people, have new experiences, spend new money, climb new trees, plant new seeds. <s>dont create</s>  You'll have to make choices, but they will be yours. <s>dont fear</s> But it all starts here, with you, right now. <s>dont start</s> Go on, do it. <s>dont go</s>
Some words are crossed out and I can't make them out. I can't imagine they are too important, so I stand up and I go.
